content:
Forge 18.2 for STU3 is now available for download from https://fire.ly/forge/.
Release 18.2 represents a minor update with stability and feature improvements.

Change log: https://simplifier.net/ui/OrganizationNews/Show?id=44

If you find a new issue or would like to submit a feature request, please contact us at forge@fire.ly.

Happy profiling!
